posts.title: Hello 铲屎官
posts.text: Welcome to 琳义宠物的博客 在这里会你会了解到铲屎官所关心的所有问题 Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
